title: New on Peacock : Every movie and TV show ( May 2023 )
body_text:
New On Peacock: May 2025
If you're looking for everything new on Peacock this month, you've come to the right place. NBCUniversal's streaming service has its fair share of original movies and TV shows, but it is also one of the best streamers for live sports, licensed movies, and NBC and MSNBC shows. There's always something worth watching any day of the week.
In May, Peacock's case-of-the-week murder mystery series Poker Face returns for its long-awaited second season. The streaming service is also premiering new movies like Steven Soderbergh's spy drama Black Bag as well as Love Hurts, starring Ke Huy Quan.
You can watch some shows on Peacock for free or sign up for Premium right here. You can also read our New on Netflix guide if you're interested in Netflix shows.
